name: Sonic Cyan Hexagon (Gigoia Studios)
description:
GIGOIA FANTASTICS PRESENTS AN INTERACTIVE CONTEMPORARY ART EXPERIENCE.

Fly through an abstract cyan landscape. Explore and interact with oceans and strange mountain formations. Explore a trippy polygon 3D world. 

Collect colored rotating hexagons to alter the landscape. Go underwater to discover visual effects. 

Headphones are highly recommended for sensorial experience. 
Music was carefully crafted with many layers of textures, synth FX and soft reverbs.

Have fun :)
